header.title: Pretty URLs
header.description: Make your phpBB forum's URLs pretty!
header.author-notes: This is very ALPHA-stage code at this poing. Do not use it unless you understand the implications.

changelog.change: Fixed the "Tried to redirect to potentially insecure url." General Error
Fixed infinite redirects with non-ascii characters in favor of a transliterate implementation

edit.action: # phpBB Pretty URLs <IfModule mod_rewrite.c> RewriteEngine On RewriteCond %{THE_REQUEST} ^([A-Z]{3,9})\ (.*)/index.php[^\ ]*\ HTTP RewriteRule ^index\.php$ %2/ [R=301,L] RewriteRule ^f([0-9]+)-[^_]+?\.html$ viewforum.php?f=$1 RewriteRule ^f([0-9]+)-[^_]+?_([0-9]+)\.html$ viewforum.php?f=$1&start=$2 RewriteRule ^t([0-9]+)-[^_]+?\.html$ viewtopic.php?t=$1 RewriteRule ^t([0-9]+)-[^_]+?_([0-9]+)\.html$ viewtopic.php?t=$1&start=$2 RewriteRule ^p([0-9]+)-[^_]+?\.html$ viewtopic.php?p=$1 RewriteRule ^u([0-9]+)-.+?\.html$ memberlist.php?mode=viewprofile&u=$1 RewriteRule ^g([0-9]+)-.+?\.html$ memberlist.php?mode=group&g=$1 RewriteRule ^leaders.html$ memberlist.php?mode=leaders RewriteRule ^egosearch.html$ search.php?search_id=egosearch RewriteRule ^unanswered.html$ search.php?search_id=unanswered RewriteRule ^unreadposts.html$ search.php?search_id=unreadposts RewriteRule ^newposts.html$ search.php?search_id=newposts RewriteRule ^active-topics.html$ search.php?search_id=active_topics RewriteRule ^faq.html$ faq.php RewriteRule ^viewonline.html$ viewonline.php RewriteRule ^viewonline-sg.html$ viewonline.php?sg=1 </IfModule>
